trans-unit.source: Advertisement settings
Advertisement
Show ad-tag-container positions
Shows all possible positions of the ad-tag-container (regardless of their activation).
Enable advertisement in header
HTML code for the advertisement in header

The size of the advertisement should not exceed a width of 648 pixels and a height of 64 pixels. __RANDOM_NUMBER__ innerhalb des HTML-Code wird durch eine Zufallszahl ersetzt. __REQUEST_RANDOM_NUMBER__ wird durch eine Zufallszahl ersetzt, die den gesamten Request gleich bleibt.
Enable advertisement in the context menu under user info box
HTML code for the advertisement in the context menu under user info box

The size of the advertisement should not exceed a width of 205 pixels. __RANDOM_NUMBER__ within the HTML code will be replaced by a random number. __REQUEST_RANDOM_NUMBER__ is replaced by a random number, the entire request remains the same.
Enable advertisement in the context menu under search box
HTML code for the advertisement in the context menu under search box
Enable advertisement in the context menu under channels box
HTML code for the advertisement in the context menu under channels box
Enable advertisement in the context menu under categories box
HTML code for the advertisement in the context menu under categories box
Enable advertisement in the context menu under tags box
HTML code for the advertisement in the context menu under tags box
Enable advertisement over content area
HTML code for the advertisement over the content area

The size of the advertisement should not exceed a width of 740 pixels. __RANDOM_NUMBER__ within the HTML code will be replaced by a random number. __REQUEST_RANDOM_NUMBER__ is replaced by a random number, the entire request remains the same.
Enable advertisement under the content area
HTML code for the advertisement under the content area
Enable advertisement as skyscraper
HTML code for the advertisement as skyscraper

The size of the advertisement should not exceed a width of 120 pixels. __RANDOM_NUMBER__ within the HTML code will be replaced by a random number. __REQUEST_RANDOM_NUMBER__ is replaced by a random number, the entire request remains the same.
Enable advertisement in footer
HTML code for the advertisement in left footer
HTML code for the advertisement in right footer

The size of the advertisement should not exceed a width of 220 pixels. __RANDOM_NUMBER__ within the HTML code will be replaced by a random number. __REQUEST_RANDOM_NUMBER__ is replaced by a random number, the entire request remains the same.
Acudeo settings
Acudeo
Program ID
